column1: #text=I stood at the bus stop and consulted the bus timetable .
#text=My bus should be there any minute .
#text=There were several people waiting with me .
#text=We were standing under the shelter , because it had started raining .
#text=It pulled up to the bus stop and we all stood in line to get on .
#text=I said hello to the driver and paid my fare .
#text=Then I found an empty seat at the back of the bus .
#text=I sat down and looked out the window at the city while we drove .
#text=There were many stops and people getting off and on .
#text=The bus grew so crowded that someone came and sat next to me .
#text=I scooted over to make room and kept looking out the window .
#text=I said excuse me to the person sitting next to me , and he moved over to let me go by .
#text=I stood up and walked off the bus .
